title: FarmKids
overview:
Series concept is based around the irony of farm animals who know nothing about
 living in the country. They are a bunch of fastlane pampered city 
animals who live a star studded life in a popular nursery petting zoo, 
but their lives take a funny unexpected turn when they suddenly get 
relocated. To top it off their new home is nothing like one would expect
 from a simple old farm. At its core, this series is aiming at twisting 
and repackaging a strong and timeless farm theme into a fast, edgy 
comedy.
